name: Bowly World 3: Triple Madness
description:
Once again Mr. Pin attempts to take over the world. In order to stop him bowly stands up… with two new friends!? Rubi and chii!

Explore new levels and worlds in the new addition to the Bowly World Series, Bowly World 3: Triple Madness.

Play Bowly World with NEW features: 

- Two new playable characters with their own play styles and level set ups, Rubi and Chii

- Interactive attack

On PC use the mouse to defeat enemies and rack up the enemy counter. On mobile tap the enemies to defeat them.
